originalText.text:
I have had to deal with this court on multiple cases. ALL kinds of fraud & criminal activity from court officers.

Not only are the judges (like Stanton & Rakoff) CORRUPT and Need to be removed, but the CLERKS are TERRIBLE. üóëÔ∏è

They will destroy documents, misfile documents and otherwise hinder litigation while taking bribes to aid & abet the corruption of the judges and practicing attorneys...

I called today and asked for instructions on locating the ECF (electronic case filing üôÑ) Motion form online.

Why did the idiot clerk in the pro se unit suck her teeth and ask what I was talking about like I said the wrong form name? (The title of the form is literally "Motion for Permission for Electronic Case Filing" üôÑ üóÑÔ∏è).

The female clerk then proceeds to use a shortened version of the name (electronic filing) to give instructions on where to locate the form.üôÑ. After asking stupid questions like "do I have a case pending"- ü§îüò§üòíüòê. As though the court's website doesn't refer to electronic filing as ECF ü§îüôÑ& they aren't the same dxmned thingü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüòêü§îüôÑüòí...

Like, üôÑü§îüòêClerk, where's the dxmned form?!?! So you can get your dumba*"off the phone with your stupid questions and comments üò§üóÉÔ∏èüöÆ wasting taxpayer time and resources.

Just... idiotic for no reason other than to act like pro se parties are incompetent... Or to show off how stupid New Yorkers can beüòèüòí. And of course they're always "black" - like those are the only people they can get to help run these schemes in the court üòÜü•¥ü§îüòíüöÆ

AMERICA NEEDS TO CLOSE ALL OF THESE SHXTTY COURTS FILLED WITH CORRUPT JUDGES AND IDIOT CLERKS, üçØ.

originalText.text: Daniel Patrick Moynihan Courthouse, United States District Court, Southern District of anew York, is located at 500 Pearl Street, New York, NY.

text.text: Daniel Patrick Moynihan Courthouse, United States District Court, Southern District of anew York, is located at 500 Pearl Street, New York, NY.

originalText.text:
Observed a jury trial and it was a great experience.
There are 2 court houses at SDNY. Know which know you are going to and get there early, look up the room number online in advance, the lineup is long.

text.text:
Observed a jury trial and it was a great experience.
There are 2 court houses at SDNY. Know which know you are going to and get there early, look up the room number online in advance, the lineup is long.

originalText.text: I had to contact the clerk's office for a case I'm working on. I politely asked the person I spoke to if he could look up the case in question on the docket, and he raised his voice and said "NO." I thought clerk's office is there to assist the public. I work in a law firm so I have an understanding how basic things work in the legal field, and this is the kind of treatment I received. I can't imagine what kind of treatment a person with no legal knowledge would receive. He was pretty impatient and couldn't wait to hang up the phone with me. I have spoken to many other clerks from different districts and none of them have been this rude and unhelpful.
